title: Lae'zel

ainst their masters. Tell Skickpit to take the lift to the surface after killing his masters. After Nere pushes the gnome into the lava, say nothing. Pick a fight with Nere, and side with the deurgar. When talking to Morghal and Orgarth, say "Did you say you keep slaves here?" and then follow up with a "Not a problem in the slightest"
